name: Lola
description: Lola is yound and likes to play outside. She is not picky about her food and about other pets.

name: Ozzy
description: Handsome Ozzy is ready to be the most loving companion to his new family, so come meet him today and take him home!

name: Bambi
description: This sweet girl loves to run around our play yards to give her long legs a good stretch, but she won't forget to stop and give some kisses to whoever is with her.

name: Leo
description: My name is Leo and I am a neutered male, black Domestic Shorthair. The shelter thinks I am about 2 years and 6 months old.

name: Fiona
description: Fiona is a sweet but shy girl who will need some extra time to adjust. We promise she is worth the wait!

name: Duke
description: I am shy little but once I trust you, I'll be your best buddy!

name: Molly
description: Molly has been spayed, microchipped, vaccinated, vet checked and is up to date with her flea and worming treatments.
